select a.statistics_time as statisticsTime,a.ybflaunchCount,c.lydjlaunchCount,b.lmdzlaunchCount from (select statistics_time,sum(launch_count) as ybflaunchCount from interval_game_launch_report where platform_name='一比分' group by statistics_time order by statistics_time desc) a inner join (select statistics_time,sum(launch_count) as lmdzlaunchCount from interval_game_launch_report where platform_name='撩妹德州' group by statistics_time order by statistics_time desc) b inner join (select statistics_time,sum(launch_count) as lydjlaunchCount from interval_game_launch_report where platform_name='乐盈电竞' group by statistics_time order by statistics_time desc) c on a.statistics_time = b.statistics_time and a.statistics_time = c.statistics_time where a.statistics_time like concat(concat('%',DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d '),'%'))
and statistics_time > DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and statistics_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')

select DATE_FORMAT(statistics_time,'%H:%i') as statisticsTime, platform_name as platformName,sum(launch_count) as launchCount from interval_game_launch_report where 1=1 and statistics_time like concat(concat('%',DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d '),'%'))
and statistics_time > DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and statistics_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
group by statistics_time,platform_name order by statistics_time desc
